t: I Tried the Spindrift Soda, and It’s Not What I Was Expecting
s: March 5, 2025 - Would I choose it over other brands of ginger ale or ginger beer? Again, no. But Tom Hanks, on his Cast Away island, would not throw this one out to sea. Calling this line “soda” is misleading. It’s liquid, in a can, with fruit on the label, but it’s not what most people think of as soda. I appreciate that it has real fruit and no added sugar, but there’s zero reason to choose this over a Spindrift sparkling water...
